name: Rascal
firstNightReminder: Put the Neighbor reminder tokens on the players neighboring the Rascal. Wake up the Rascal, show them a character type that corresponds to either of the players with Neighbor tokens. Then move the Neighbor reminder tokens one step away from the Rascal.
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Rascal, show them a character type that corresponds to either of the players with Neighbor tokens. Then move the Neighbor reminder tokens one step away from the Rascal.
ability: Each night, you learn the character type of a neighbor, then you consider your neighbors to be one step further.
